name: cryptocurrencytracker
description: This is the **main orchestrator module** for the Cryptocurrency Portfolio Tracker project. It pulls together two core submodules:

scripts.sub:install: cd CryptocurrencyTrackerWeb && npm install && cd .. && cd CryptocurrencyTrackerAPI && npm install
scripts.start:dev:all: cd CryptocurrencyTrackerWeb && npm run dev && cd .. & cd CryptocurrencyTrackerAPI && npm run start:dev
scripts.build:dev:images: cd CryptocurrencyTrackerWeb && npm run build:dev:image && cd .. && cd CryptocurrencyTrackerAPI && npm run build:dev:image
scripts.db:dev:migrate: cd CryptocurrencyTrackerAPI && NODE_ENV=development npm run migrate:up
scripts.db:dev:revert: cd CryptocurrencyTrackerAPI && NODE_ENV=development npm run migrate:down
